name: Aviano
description:
Test your piloting skills, experience the feeling of flying highly detailed hang gliders in unique conditions.
Aviano is an exploration game from other worlds, where the player plays an archaeologist who wants to solve a mystery! And it will take him to fly with his hang glider in other ways, challenging your pilot skills until the end of each level. The controls are easy to understand but skill based, the physics-based flight model. It offers a realistic flight experience, similar to a real flying wing, am with higher speeds to entertain and give speed sensations to the player…

4k GAME READY
If you have an AMD RX 6000 series or Nvidia RTX 3000 series, you can enjoy this game in 4k.

235 LEVELS
  • 143 + 13 Levels story Campain
  • 39 Levels Ring Attack Campain
  • 39 levels Time Attack Campain
  • 13 Player Vs Player Campain
  • 1 Relax Mode

20+ HOURS OF GAMEPLAY
After learning how to use your hang glider you can use it for the three long campaigns, but also to fly without a purpose.

THE WORLDS IS AT FINGERTIPS
You will discover wilderness areas of your world and strange new worlds.

HANG GLIDER
Meticulously detailed hang gliders

3 DIFFICULT LEVELS
Play as a pro or a beginner by adjusting the difficulty level.

STORY
The Story Campaign will guide you to fantastic places and worlds

TUTORIAL
Learn how to use your hang glider before venturing into history
